revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=PLA4231 |revision= |upc=760559120061 |asin=B00B7DG8WS |est_release_date=01/29/2013 |fcc_date=12/19/2012 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=AboCom |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=extender, Powerline Access Point |fcc_id=I88PLA4231 |pcb_id=M01-PLW5Z-D20 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.1 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9341 |cpu2_brand=Atheros |cpu2_model= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6405EM2I-12G |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9725G6JB-25 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9341 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports= |flags=HomePlug AV |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.2 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui=CC:5D:4E |oui_eth=CC:5D:4E }} {{TagLine|500Mbps Powerline Wireless N Extender}}
"M01-PLW5Z-D20" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"M01-AD09+-D10" is silkscreened on the power module ([[AboCom]]).
The device is shown as using two [[Skyworks]] ''(SiGe)'' [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=1505 SE2620T] 2.4GHz FEM.
The FCC sample label shows a sample MAC of CC:5D:4E (''[[ZyXEL]]'' OUI). :It is presumed to indeed use a CC:5D:4E OUI..
The default credentials in this entry are per the FCC manual.
